short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Permanently ignore the noise on interest.co.nz comments sections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy the interest.co.nz comments section but not the incessant, repitive posting by some users? This simple chrome extension adds a "Hide All" link next to commenters names, once clicked and confirmed all comments from that user will be hidden from your view. You can unblock a given user in the extension's options page in the future if you want to.
